Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed jar, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of several lines of Coptic text in black and red ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394174) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394174)
